title: Complete Horror
description: Create fear... Complete Horror is a professional game music library featuring ambient textures, drones, loops and scares for creating atmosphere and tension in horror games.
longDescription:
Complete Horror is a professional game music library featuring a wide selection of ambient textures, loops and scares designed to create tension, atmosphere and fear in horror games.


Audio Previews (Soundcloud): https://soundcloud.com/john_french/sets/complete-horror


Create Fear.

Complete Horror includes a large selection of dark, ambient looping textures that are perfect for creating atmosphere, tension and fear. Each track is uniquely designed, using high quality instruments, recordings and synthesis. Drop one in a scene to prototype musical ideas instantly or use several to create an evolving soundtrack.


Create Narrative.

Use the provided musical cues to create story and narrative. Tracks include dissonant piano, creepy music boxes, mysterious melodies and a demonic choir piece to give your game unique character.


Create Danger.

When atmosphere and tension are no longer enough, Complete Horror includes a range of danger tracks featuring drums, synths and hard-limited textures.


Scare your Player

Complete Horror features 20 one-shot cues to scare, unsettle and otherwise disturb your players. From short sharp jumps to long terrifying moments, thereâ€™s a sound for every scare.


Add Realism

Included with Complete Horror are a number of bonus audio effects, designed to add realism and polish to your project. Tracks include audio ambience for a draughty, empty house, rain and thunder, paranormal whispering and a heartbeat loop in four tempos (from calm to terrified).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Premium audio quality
  • Large selection of uniquely designed sounds
  • Seamless loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 108

Number of Audio Cues: 108

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 105 mins approx

Supported Development Platforms: 4.10 or higher.

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: http://johnleonardfrench.com/downloads/complete_horror.pdf

Support: me@johnleonardfrench.com


Please Note: Complete Horror is also available as part of the Ultimate Game Music Collection.
